title: Fullstack e-commerce
description: Create a fullstack e-commerce using the MERN stack, featuring an admin dashboard with CRUD operations for managing products, users, and orders.
tech: MERN-stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) along with TypeScript, Bootstrap and Stripe integration.

title: Weather App
description: Create a weather app that retrieves real-time data from the Open Weather API, allowing users to check weather conditions and forecasts.
tech: React, TypeScript, Bootstrap, Open Weather API

title: Semantic HTML and accessibility
description: Showcase my ability to implement advanced CSS, semantic HTML, and follow accessibility best practices based on a given mock-up.
